org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer.layout

Class RelativeTableConstraints

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer.layout.AbstractTableConstraints
      • org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer.layout.RelativeTableConstraints
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomizerConstraints, TableConstraints

    public class RelativeTableConstraints
extends AbstractTableConstraints
    The following inner class is used to bind components to their constraints. http://java.sun.com/products/jfc/tsc/articles/tablelayout/
    Author:
    Daniel E. Barbalace

      • getColumn

        public int getColumn()
        Gets a string representation of this TableLayoutConstraints.
        Returns:
        a string in the form "row 1, column 1, row 2, column 2" or "row, column, horizontal justification, vertical justification"
